short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add items to your Nove inventory in a flash.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💻 Stop living in 200 tabs when you’re browsing for clients. 
🛍 Shop the world wide web and when you find an item you dig - add it, organize it, and save it to your inventory. 
🏷 Use custom tags to make search in your inventory even easier.
🧠 Start creating for your clients right away.
